00040 typedef enum connection_status_def
00041 {
00042   CONNECTION_NONE = 0,
00043   CONNECTION_CONNECTING,
00044   CONNECTION_ACTIVE,
00045   CONNECTION_PASSIVE,
00046   CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED
00047 } connection_status;

00050 typedef enum authentication_status_def
00051 {

00053   AUTHENTICATION_Q1,
00054   AUTHENTICATION_STAGE_1,
00055   AUTHENTICATION_Q3,
00056   AUTHENTICATION_FINISHED

00061 typedef struct fd_data_def
00062 {
00063   pthread_mutex_t mutex;
00064   pthread_cond_t cond;
00065 
00066   htab_t waiting4reply;         
00067   alloc_pool waiting4reply_pool;
